ItemLoc.Desc: Teaches how to craft a consumable item, requiring an Alchemy Kit.

ItemLoc.Name: Shadow Light Kazite Shirt
ItemLoc.Desc: A darkened Kazite Light Shirt, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLoc.Name: Golden Iron Knuckles
ItemLoc.Desc: Gilded simple Iron Knuckles, passed down by your ancestors.

ItemLoc.Name: Crafting: Golden Knuckles
ItemLoc.Desc: Teaches how to craft a weapon, requiring no crafting station.

ItemLoc.Name: Throw Lantern
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Lantern
Throws your equipped lantern on the enemy, creating a zone of fire for 5 seconds.
Using this skill destroys the lantern.

ItemLoc.Name: Predator Leap
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Rage Boon, Melee Weapon
Jumping attack that creates a shockwave upon landing, with high Impact and Damage. Requires the Rage boon.

ItemLoc.Name: Backstab
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Dagger
Dagger attack. If the attack hits the enemy’s back, the damage and impact are tripled.

ItemLoc.Name: Opportunist Stab
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Dagger
Dagger attack. If the enemy has the Pain or Confusion hex, this attack’s damage and knockback are tripled. If it has both, it is 6 times stronger instead.

ItemLoc.Name: Dagger Slash
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Dagger
Simple attack with the dagger.

ItemLoc.Name: Flamethrower
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Torch or Lantern
Shoots fire from the torch or lantern, which also inflicts the Burning status effect.
This skill lowers the durability of the torch or lantern used.

ItemLoc.Name: Evasion Shot
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Bow
Shoot an arrow while jumping backwards. Causes the Cripple status effect on the target.
Locking on foes is essential with this skill.

ItemLoc.Name: Sniper Shot
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Bow
Let loose a very strong arrow shot with a long windup, making it a poor option in the middle of combat.

ItemLoc.Name: Piercing Shot
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Bow
Strong shot that goes through enemies and hits other foes behind. Inflicts Extreme Bleeding.

ItemLoc.Name: Push Kick
ItemLoc.Desc: Weak attack that excels at knocking back enemies.

ItemLoc.Name: Sweep Kick
ItemLoc.Desc: Weak attack with a wide arc of effect and high Impact. Will knock down a target afflicted by the Confusion status effect.

ItemLoc.Name: Mana Push
ItemLoc.Desc:
Spell which inflicts no damage but has high Impact in a wide area in front of the caster.
Can be combined with other spells for powerful effects.

ItemLoc.Name: Mana Ward
ItemLoc.Desc:
Envelops you in Mana and, for an instant, you become immune to Damage.
Can be combined with other spells for powerful effects.

ItemLoc.Name: Conjure
ItemLoc.Desc: Spell which does nothing on its own, but can be combined with other abilities.

ItemLoc.Name: Shield Charge
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Shield
Rush forward to hit foes with your shield for high Impact. Can hit the target twice.

ItemLoc.Name: Gong Strike
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Infused Weapon, Shield
Strike your weapon on your shield, removing the elemental infusion to make an explosion of that element.

ItemLoc.Name: Rune: Dez
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Lexicon
Blue rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes, in the correct order.

ItemLoc.Name: Rune: Shim
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Lexicon
Red rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes, in the correct order.

ItemLoc.Name: Rune: Egoth
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Lexicon
Purple rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes, in the correct order.

ItemLoc.Name: Rune: Fal
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Lexicon
Green rune that does nothing on its own, but can produce combo effects by casting other runes, in the correct order.

ItemLoc.Name: Chakram Pierce
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Chakram, Discipline Boon
Launch the disc forward, possibly hitting the enemy twice. Discipline is required to cast this spell.

ItemLoc.Name: Chakram Dance
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Chakram, Discipline Boon
The disc sways left and right as it advances, hitting multiple times and dealing high damage. Discipline is required to cast this spell.

ItemLoc.Name: Chakram Arc
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Chakram, Discipline Boon
The disc sweeps the area in front of the caster, dealing high Damage and Impact. Discipline is required to cast this spell.

ItemLoc.Name: Counterstrike
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Any Melee Weapon
Completely block a physical attack, striking the attacker and dealing high Damage.

ItemLoc.Name: Serpent's Parry
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Dagger
Counter a physical attack with a strong dagger strike. Targets afflicted by Confusion are briefly stunned. Targets afflicted by Pain will be inflicted Extreme Bleeding.

ItemLoc.Name: Mace Infusion
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 1-Handed Bludgeon
Block an elemental attack, infusing your weapon with that element.

ItemLoc.Name: Flash Onslaught
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Any Melee Weapon, Discipline Boon.
Attack all enemies within a close distance with increased Damage and Impact. Using the skill consumes the Discipline boon.

ItemLoc.Name: Puncture
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 1-Handed Sword
Close combat attack which deals high Damage and Impact, and inflicts Pain.

ItemLoc.Name: Execution
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 2-Handed Axe
High Damage and Impact strike that deals twice its Damage against knocked down foes.

ItemLoc.Name: Juggernaut
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 2-Handed Bludgeon
Slow but powerful melee attack that inflicts Confusion. Increases your Impact Resistance during this attack.

ItemLoc.Name: Moon Swipe
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Halberd, Staff
Double attack that deals high damage, and that increases in power if you have the Rage or Discipline boons.

ItemLoc.Name: Shield Infusion
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Shield
Block an elemental attack. When you next block, an elemental explosion will burst from you.

ItemLoc.Name: Simeon's Gambit
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Spear
Deflect a melee attack and counter with a powerful strike. You will still strike if no attack was deflected, but for less damage,

ItemLoc.Name: Perfect Strike
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Any Melee Weapon, Discipline Boon
Lunging attack that ignores all defenses and inflicts Pain.

ItemLoc.Name: Brace
ItemLoc.Desc:
Blocks an attack, restoring your Stability and giving you the Discipline boon.
All nearby enemies are knocked back.

ItemLoc.Name: Pommel Counter
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 2-Handed Sword
Counter an attack with a high Impact strike using the sword’s pommel. Inflicts Confusion and can chain into melee attacks.

ItemLoc.Name: Feral Strikes
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Melee Weapon, Rage Boon
Attack twice, consuming your Rage boon in the process. Inflicts Extreme Bleeding and Pain.

ItemLoc.Name: Talus Cleaver
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 1-Handed Axe
Low blow that reduces the target's mobility. Inflicts Pain and Cripple.

ItemLoc.Name: Reveal Soul
ItemLoc.Desc:
Reveal the blueish soul orb left by deceased thieves and adventurers.
Certain spells must be cast in proximity to a soul.

ItemLoc.Name: Sigil of Wind
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Activated Wind Altar
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

ItemLoc.Name: Sigil of Fire
ItemLoc.Desc:
Consumes: Fire Stone
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

ItemLoc.Name: Sigil of Ice
ItemLoc.Desc:
Consumes: Cold Stone
Create a magic circle on the ground. Certain skills have additional effects when cast within this circle.

ItemLoc.Name: Spark
ItemLoc.Desc:
Tiny fire explosion that deals negligible damage, but can be used in combination with other spells for greater effects.
This spell can light campfires.

ItemLoc.Name: Infuse Light
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Blessed Boon
Temporarily adds Lightning Damage to your melee weapon, also making the weapon a useful light source. Consumes your Blessed boon.

ItemLoc.Name: Infuse Wind
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Activated Wind Altar
Increases the Impact and Attack Speed of your melee weapon, for 3 minutes.
Your stamina burn increases more quickly, however.

ItemLoc.Name: Infuse Frost
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Cool Boon
Temporarily adds Frost damage to your melee weapon and inflicts Slow Down on enemies. Consumes your Cool boon.

ItemLoc.Name: Infuse Fire
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Warm Boon
Temporarily adds Fire damage to your melee weapon and inflicts Burning on enemies. Consumes your Warm boon.

ItemLoc.Name: Call to Elements
ItemLoc.Desc: Grants you a boon that varies according to your location when casting this spell.

ItemLoc.Name: Elemental Discharge
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Infused Weapon
Shoot a projectile of the element that is infused on your weapon.

ItemLoc.Name: Fire/Reload
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Pistol, Bullet
Load the equipped pistol with a bullet, or fires if it is already loaded.
Some abilities load special bullets into your pistol, which are fired using this skill.

ItemLoc.Name: Frost Bullet
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Pistol, Cool Boon
Load the pistol with a bullet that makes a short-distance blast which slows enemies. Removes your Cool boon.
Shooting it requires the use of the Fire/Reload skill.

ItemLoc.Name: Blood Bullet
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Pistol, Possessed Boon
Absorb the enemy’s life into your pistol as a blood bullet, healing yourself.
Shooting it requires the use of the Fire/Reload skill.

ItemLoc.Name: Shatter Bullet
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Pistol, Iron Scraps
Load a bullet with high Impact which also inflicts Pain.
Shooting it requires the use of the Fire/Reload skill.

ItemLoc.Name: Marathoner
ItemLoc.Desc: Sprinting consumes 40% less stamina.

ItemLoc.Name: Weather Tolerance
ItemLoc.Desc:
Increases your Hot and Cold Weather Defense by 8.
Increases your Decay Resistance by 5.

ItemLoc.Name: Spellblade's Awakening
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your maximum Health, Stamina and Mana by 15 each.

ItemLoc.Name: Steady Arm
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases Impact Resistance by 10 while your are blocking.

ItemLoc.Name: Fitness
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your maximum Health by 25 and the amount of Health you restore while sleeping by 20%

ItemLoc.Name: Master of Motion
ItemLoc.Desc: While under the effect of the Discipline boon, Impact Resistance and all damage resistances are increased by 15.

ItemLoc.Name: Steadfast Ascetic
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your maximum Stamina by 40.

ItemLoc.Name: Slow Metabolism
ItemLoc.Desc: It takes more time for you to become hungry, thirsty and sleepy.

ItemLoc.Name: Fire Affinity
ItemLoc.Desc: Increase your resistance to Fire by 20 and the Fire damage you inflict is increased by 15%

ItemLoc.Name: Leyline Connection
ItemLoc.Desc:
You regain 0.34 mana per second.
This is a constant effect.

ItemLoc.Name: Survivor's Resilience
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your maximum Health by 40.

ItemLoc.Name: Well of Mana
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your maximum Mana by 40.

ItemLoc.Name: Swift Foot
ItemLoc.Desc: Your movement speed is increased by 10%

ItemLoc.Name: Feather Dodge
ItemLoc.Desc: Lowers the Stamina cost of dodging by 50% and allows you to dodge unimpeded even when wearing a backpack.

ItemLoc.Name: Fast Maintenance
ItemLoc.Desc: You repair your equipment 50% faster when you allocate time to Repairing in the rest menu.

ItemLoc.Name: Shamanic Resonance
ItemLoc.Desc:
The effects of boons on you are increased.
For example, a boon that increases your Fire Resistance by 20 would increase it by 30 instead.

ItemLoc.Name: Hunter's Eye
ItemLoc.Desc: You can lock on enemies at longer distances when using a bow.

ItemLoc.Name: Internalized Lexicon
ItemLoc.Desc: Removes the need to have an equipped Lexicon in your off-hand to cast runic spells.

ItemLoc.Name: Arcane Syntax
ItemLoc.Desc: Gain access to more advanced runic combos.

ItemLoc.Name: Stealth Training
ItemLoc.Desc:
Enemies will have a harder time spotting you.
Sprinting and having a light source will still easily alert them, though.

ItemLoc.Name: Runic Prefix
ItemLoc.Desc: All runic spells are more powerful or have added effects.

ItemLoc.Name: Pressure Plate Training
ItemLoc.Desc:
Enables you to deploy the complex Pressure Plate Traps.
These traps are primarily armed with charges, which shoot poison, fire and more.

ItemLoc.Name: Armor Training
ItemLoc.Desc: Decreases the stamina and movement penalties from wearing armor by 50%

ItemLoc.Name: Pressure Plate Expertise
ItemLoc.Desc:
Increases the power of your Pressure Plate Traps.
Allows the reuse of Pressure Plates after they have been triggered, though they must be re-armed with another charge or compatible item.

ItemLoc.Name: Enrage
ItemLoc.Desc:
Grants the Rage boon, which increases the Impact of your attacks.
Using this skill burns a bit of your maximum health until the next time you sleep.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

ItemLoc.Name: Focus
ItemLoc.Desc:
Grants the Discipline boon, which increases the Physical Damage of your attacks.
Using this skill burns a bit of your maximum stamina until the next time you sleep.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

ItemLoc.Name: Warm
ItemLoc.Desc:
Grants the Warm boon, which increases your Fire Damage and Fire Resistance. It also increases your protection to cold weather.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

ItemLoc.Name: Cool
ItemLoc.Desc:
Grants the Cool boon, which increases your Frost Damage and Frost Resistance. It also increases your protection to hot weather.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

ItemLoc.Name: Mist
ItemLoc.Desc:
Grants the Mist boon, which increases your Ethereal Damage and Ethereal Resistance.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

ItemLoc.Name: Blessed
ItemLoc.Desc:
Grants the Blessed boon, which increases your Lightning Damage and Lightning Resistance.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

ItemLoc.Name: Possessed
ItemLoc.Desc:
Grants the Possessed boon, which increases your Decay Damage and Decay Resistance.
Certain skills require this boon to be active.

ItemLoc.Name: Spiritual Communion
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases the Etheral, Lightning and Decay damage you deal by 10%.

ItemLoc.Name: Ghostly Sensitivity
ItemLoc.Desc: Curse that lowers your Ethereal Resistance by 15.

ItemLoc.Name: Sacrifice
ItemLoc.Desc: Decreases your maximum Stamina by 7.

ItemLoc.Name: Painful Sacrifice
ItemLoc.Desc: Decreases your maximum Stamina by 15.

ItemLoc.Name: Purified
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your Decay Resistance by 20.

ItemLoc.Name: Acceptance
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your Cold and Hot Weather Defense by 8.

ItemLoc.Name: Divine Protection
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your Physical Protection by 4.

ItemLoc.Name: Sanctified Protection
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your Physical Protection by 2.

ItemLoc.Name: Divine Assistance
ItemLoc.Desc: Reduces the Stamina and Mana costs of your actions by 10%.

ItemLoc.Name: Sanctified Assistance
ItemLoc.Desc: Reduces the Stamina and Mana costs of your actions by 5%.

ItemLoc.Name: Peacemaker Elixir
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your maximum Health, Stamina and Mana by 20.

ItemLoc.Name: Blood of Giants
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your maximum Health by 40.

ItemLoc.Name: Ancestors' Memories
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases your maximum Mana by 25.

ItemLoc.Name: Alchemical Experiment
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases all Damage you deal by 15%.

ItemLoc.Name: Exalted
ItemLoc.Desc:
Double all the Damage you deal. Reduce the Stamina and Mana costs of your actions by 30%. Increase all Damage Resistances by 10.
You are inflicted with the incurable “Life Drain” sickness.

ItemLoc.Name: The Technique
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 1-Handed Sword
Unleash a flurry of 6 rapid strikes.

ItemLoc.Name: Scalp Collector
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 1-Handed Axe
Inflicts Bleeding on hit. Finish off an enemy with this skill to gain the Kill Streak Buff, which grants bonus damage and speed.

ItemLoc.Name: Dispersion
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 1-Handed Mace
Create a highly damaging shockwave that destabilizes you. If your Weapon has an elemental imbue, it uses that element and imflicts the associated Hex on foes.

ItemLoc.Name: Moment of Truth
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 2-Handed Sword
A highly damaging strike that bypasses 50% of enemy resistances. Lowers your own resistances by 50% for 15 seconds.

ItemLoc.Name: Warrior's Vein
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 2-Handed Axe
A strong counter with high impact that inflicts Extreme Bleeding on yourself and the enemy.

ItemLoc.Name: Crescendo
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: 2-Handed Mace
A quick strike that generates 1 stack of the Craze Buff on hit, which grants bonus damage. All stacks of Craze are lost if you are damaged.

ItemLoc.Name: Vicious Cycle
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Spear
A high damage and high impact sweep that inflicts Cripple on enemies.

ItemLoc.Name: Strafing Run
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Bow, 5 equipped arrows
Run to the left or right while unleashing a storm of 5 arrows. Best used while locked onto a target.

ItemLoc.Name: Vital Crash
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Any Fist Weapon
A long distance running tackle that does more damage the more Health % you have and more impact the more Stamina % you have. Inflicts Confusion and Pain on you.

ItemLoc.Name: Splitter
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Polearm
A leaping strike that increases in power as the enemy's life % decreases, and uses the element infused on the weapon. You will evade all enemy attacks while performing this move.

ItemLoc.Name: Haunting Beat
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Ghost Drums in inventory.
Deploys the Ghost Drum and causes Haunted in a small radius. There can't be another Totem within 30 meters.

ItemLoc.Name: Welkin Ring
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Sky Chimes in inventory.
Deploys the Sky Chimes and causes Doom in a small radius. There can't be another Totem within 30 meters.

ItemLoc.Name: Miasmic Tolerance
ItemLoc.Desc: Increase Status Effect resistance by 15% when well rested.

ItemLoc.Name: Sacred Fumes
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases Barrier by 7.

ItemLoc.Name: Harmony and Melody
ItemLoc.Desc: Allows you to have both a Sky Chimes totem and a Ghost Drums totem active in close proximity of each other at the same time.

ItemLoc.Name: Nurturing Echo
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: At least one deployed Totem within 15 meters.
Generates a bubble around nearby Totems that provide restoration of some kind. Lasts longer depending on how many Charges the Totem has built up.

ItemLoc.Name: Reverberation
ItemLoc.Desc:
Required: Must be facing a Totem within 1 meter
Recalls a deployed totem to your inventory, and generates a zone of recurring damage. The size, damage type and duration depend on the Totem and how many Charges it has built up.

ItemLoc.Name: Battle Rhythm
ItemLoc.Desc: Your deployed Sky Chimes increase Barrier by 5 and Ghost Drums increase Protection by 5 when within 8 meters. This bonus also applies to your allies.

ItemLoc.Name: Infuse Mana
ItemLoc.Desc: Infuses your weapon with the Ethereal element.

ItemLoc.Name: Kirouac's Breakthrough
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases max Health by 25 and Physical damage by 15%.

ItemLoc.Name: Elatt's Intervention
ItemLoc.Desc: Increases Barrier by 2 and Protection by 2

ItemLoc.Name: Infuse Blood
ItemLoc.Desc: Infuses your weapon with the Decay element, as well as Extreme Poison and Extreme bleeding. Leeches 10% of damage dealt into your HP. Costs 20 Life to activate.

ItemLoc.Name: Brawns
